### About

I completed my undergraduate study in Businese Management(Pharmaceutical track) at [China Pharmaceutical University](https://en.cpu.edu.cn/) in 2019. Then I received a MS in Biostatistics(Theory and Methods track) from [Columbia University](https://www.mailman.columbia.edu/become-student/departments/biostatistics), during which time I joined LeeLab and a [paper](https://www.sciencedirect.com/science/article/pii/S1053811921010569) was published. 

I joined [IQVIA](https://www.iqvia.com/) (Data Science & Advanced Analytics) in 2021. Feel free to reach out via [LinkedIn](https://www.linkedin.com/in/weiwei-qi-539677164/).
